$ About GNTR

$ gntr --version

v1.0.0 - Building digital excellence

Who We Are

GNTR is a digital solutions company specializing in web development, e-commerce platforms, mobile applications, custom MCP servers, and AI integration for businesses.

We believe in building software that not only works but excels. Every project is crafted with attention to detail, modern best practices, and a focus on user experience.

> Our Values

Quality First

We build solutions that stand the test of time with clean code and best practices.

Client Focused

Your success is our success. We work closely with you throughout the entire process.

Innovation

We stay ahead of the curve with the latest technologies and methodologies.

Transparency

Clear communication and honest timelines. No surprises, just results.

> What We Do

$ gntr build --type=website

Website Development

Custom websites built with modern frameworks like Astro, React, and Next.js. Responsive, fast, and SEO-optimized.

$ gntr build --type=ecommerce

E-commerce Solutions

Full-featured online stores with payment processing, inventory management, and analytics integration.

$ gntr build --type=mobile

Mobile Applications

Cross-platform and native mobile apps for iOS and Android with smooth performance and intuitive UX.

$ gntr build --type=mcp

Custom MCP Servers

Model Context Protocol servers for seamless AI integration with your existing systems and workflows.

$ gntr build --type=ai

AI Integration

Integrate AI-powered features into your applications with custom models, chatbots, and automation.

$ gntr connect
